comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: This is a wonderful photograph – rich in detail and personality! Liszt's Liebesträume ("A Dream of Love") – performed yesterday on a magnificent world stage in Oslo – is still playing in my mind, which makes this portrait all-the-more intimate and compelling. Louis Held, the photographer, was a protégé of Franz Liszt [1] – that must have been fun and amazing!

comment.author: 51162504@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Classical Composers, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 37381115@N04
comment._content: @Pixel Wrangler: thanks for the info on Held.

comment.author: 60652967@N02
comment._content: Beautiful Photo, taken in 1872 or later. Louis Held met him in 1872 and studied with him in Weimar.
